name: RSSHub
author: DIYgod
description: RSSHub is an open source, easy to use, and extensible RSS feed generator. It's capable of generating RSS feeds from pretty much everything.

form_fields.label: Access Key
form_fields.hint: Global access key to restrict feed generation (leave empty for open access)

form_fields.label: GitHub Token
form_fields.hint: GitHub personal access token for GitHub routes

form_fields.label: YouTube API Key
form_fields.hint: YouTube Data API v3 key for YouTube routes

form_fields.label: Telegram Bot Token
form_fields.hint: Telegram bot token for Telegram routes

form_fields.label: Twitter/X Auth Token
form_fields.hint: Twitter/X auth token for Twitter routes (requires valid account)
